Here is the list of signs with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries are often charismatic and confident, but can be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Practical and dependable, Tauruses value stability and security, but can be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are naturally curious and communicative, but can be flighty and unreliable.
4. Cancer - 8/10 - Emotional and nurturing, Cancers are highly empathetic and protective of loved ones, but can be moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 9/10 - Confident and passionate, Leos are natural performers who crave attention and admiration, but can be prideful and dominant.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical and hardworking, Virgos are detail-oriented and practical, but can be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans value harmony and balance, but can be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are naturally perceptive and private, but can be secretive and aggressive.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are freedom-loving and enthusiastic, but can be reckless and blunt.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, Capricorns are practical and responsible, but can be aloof and serious.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and unconventional, Aquarians are independent and innovative, but can be rebellious and unpredictable.
12. Pisces - 7/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are dreamy and artistic, but can be scattered and impressionable.
